event.title: was created by the legislature in April 7, 1870

data.event: The county was created by the legislature in April 7, 1870, during the Reconstruction Era.

event.title: June 2006) has the following members: District 1: Rev. Jerry Wilson (vice-president) District 2: Bobby J. Watts District 3: Nolan Earl Williamson District 4: Doug Moak District 5: Gary Walker (president) The offices of president and vice-president on the county supervisors rotate

data.event: The Board of Supervisors governing Lincoln County, currently (June 2006) has the following members: District 1: Rev. Jerry Wilson (vice-president) District 2: Bobby J. Watts District 3: Nolan Earl Williamson District 4: Doug Moak District 5: Gary Walker (president) The offices of president and vice-president on the county supervisors rotate annually.
